website_summaries.verdict: For anyone concerned with consuming only natural ingredients, this is the MCT oil powder to invest in.
pros: Company uses natural and organic ingredients
Oil provides increased energy levels without a crash
Has no flavor and can go undetected even in water
cons: Many prefer actual oil to oil powder

customer_reviews.title: This is the best MCT oil powder I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best MCT oil powder I've used. It mixes in easy and seamlessly gives me that little boost in the morning. I've used Bulletproof and Perfect Keto previously and this is at least on par with those. The taste is subtle but good - perfect for coffee or blending into a protein shake, which is what I do. Highly recommend. I am loving both of my NowKeto items so far. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: NOWKETO MCT OIL POWDER
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, healthy and tastes delicious! Does not mix as well as other keto creamer with other added ingredients but the healthy/pure aspect is why I purchased Nowketo brand
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: ... about 6 months but I have truly not have great results til I’ve started using the NowKeto products
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done keto on and off for about 6 months but I have truly not have great results til I’ve started using the NowKeto products. I use the MC oil Powder in my coffee and I love it, I can fast usually til 1 or 2 pm!!! It’s not even a noticeable difference in taste
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Knocked out of ketosis
customer_reviews.text: This product states only MCT which hard to believe since a binder is needed to make powder. Wondering what the binder may be since feel like this knocks me out of ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pure delish!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST product! Taste is good, mixes really well and unlike so many, there is only one ingredient and no fillers. So many are loaded with maltodextrin, carageenan, guar gum and more. This is truly an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Can mix it with anything and it doesn't affect the taste.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can mix it with anything because it has no taste. I felt the energy pick up and my appetite was less. Only been a few days so I will update later.
customer_reviews.author: DiscipleofJesus

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor! Who doesn’t love salted caramel?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better in your coffee every morning! My hubby and I both enjoy this flavor and while he thinks there is a slight aftertaste it doesn’t slow him down from adding to his own coffe daily.
customer_reviews.author: THEDILLARD

customer_reviews.title: NO FILLERS! 100% MCT oil!
customer_reviews.text: The liquid MCT oils can be quite messy, especially when traveling or for my kids to use. This powder is much tidier and I can mix it into many food items.
customer_reviews.author: Myrinda Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I’ve bought 2 more bottles since my first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tylisha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great MCT Coffee Creamer!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately noticed these MCTs were different than other powders I had tried before. That’s because Now Keto contains pure MCT oil powder. No other ingredients! It’s an excellent addition to your morning coffee. It would blend well with smoothies too!
customer_reviews.author: kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Taste
customer_reviews.text: Loved the taste! Mixes is easily. Great as a quick add to my morning coffee. Been on a Keto diet for over a year and love to find products that complement my lifestyle. Great for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeRocks

customer_reviews.title: Taste and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice taste and great macros! Takes the edge off of using no creamer in my coffee. Gives that extra boost of fat and keeps me on track.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia Polofsky

customer_reviews.title: Best MCT Oil Powder You Will Ever Try!
customer_reviews.text: Best MCT Oil Powder I have ever used. No flavor, dissolves instantly and easily into all liquids! Also a good dose of MCT per serving. This is essential for the keto lifestyle. Cannot live without this!
customer_reviews.author: Millennial Keto Couple

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the salted caramel flavor to add to my coffee. It has an after taste that’s unnatural. Could not get it to blend in to my coffee now matter how much I stirred. It always floats to the top. Not sure what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It does add a small creamy texture with very light taste which I like. But the extra energy boost is great. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great keto creamer.
customer_reviews.text: Best keto creamer I have found. Tastes sweet without all the bad stuff. Most definitely will buy again. Best way to use is to blend with coffee. You can use iced or hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, as describe, and packed well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: 112 LSR

customer_reviews.title: ... taken in the morning fuels your body with the good fat but will also give you energy
customer_reviews.text: I was told that MCT taken in the morning fuels your body with the good fat but will also give you energy. This MCT powder is awesome it gave my body the fuel it needed.I felt energized all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I had been using coconut oil but the powder mixes well with no oil slick.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stern

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I like that is dissolved easily in my coffee. I tried another brand and it wasn’t as good. I’m going to stick with this one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Rawlinson

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many mct powders finally found the right one , it's so good and it melts , no oily after taste .
customer_reviews.author: karen I

customer_reviews.title: That it gives me assistance in weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the powder,, however it does not blend in my coffee as well as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powder Oil!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Once you pop you can’t stop! It gets old drinking oil so this powder is PERFECT!!!! I get into ketosis quick
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product -nausea, illness
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE formulation. Made me violently ill. Do NOT use this unless you plan on being home for 24-48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Cam

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal Holyfield!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It seriously has no taste, so I have enjoyed it's benefits in Green tea, water and in my BCAAs. Great for keeping me in ketosis if I decided to have an extra egg or indulge on a huge salad. TO BE CLEAR... this product is not going to put you into ketosis after eating biscuits and gravy all day...or all weekend, but is does give you that wiggle room when you over indulge a bit on the good stuff. Great taken before a workout and because its not a "stimulant" per se, there is n crash, just nice clean energy! Enjoy! I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Canta

customer_reviews.title: Great Keto Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Keto Product! It works great in my daily smoothie to help keep me in ketosis. It blends well even with cold water. It has lasted longer than I expected and there is more product in the container than similar brands I have purchased. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cbreazeal

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived timely and was well sealed. I’ve added to my morning smoothie and it definitely suppresses my appetite. Non-flavored and mixes well. I’ve only used for two days so will need to asses impact on ketones and weight loss. I will be mixing it into my cookie dough fat bombs so will update in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: SALTED CARAMEL to sweet for me
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients, blends well. However, having been on keto for awhile my palate for sweets has definitely become more subdued. One scoop of this was shockingly sweet for me (had to throw it out). I'll try 1/2 scoop in my coffee tomorrow and use the rest of this powder in pancakes or baked goods of some sort. If you like super sweet this is for you. If you enjoy a mild sweetness buy another product or start out with half a scoop. I also feel the sweetener aftertaste on my palate long after my few sips of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: GCS2012

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Information
customer_reviews.text: In the past I did use Perfect Ket salted caramel flavor but it’s always out of stock. So, I decided to use NOWKETO but this brand did not work well with my GI tract. On four different occasions, I had to run to the nearest restroom otherwise things were not going to be pretty. So, I learned my lesson and I discontinued the use of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Femalefeline Xoch

customer_reviews.title: Great MCT Oil Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder - perfect for bullet proof coffee or "butter coffee" as some refer to it. It mixes well and has no taste so you can flavor your coffee however you want to - or not. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Derasmo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me going until lunch
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting this in my coffee in the morning and I am not as hungry. It is easier for me to stay on track with my diet. I'm usually hungry a few hours after breakfast but I can easily make it until lunch now. It doesn't change the taste of my coffee at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee in the morning. Not a real strong flavor. Just enough. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't clump. Just put it in first thing then add your liquid
customer_reviews.text: I did get none flavored and use it daily. I love it. It mixes well and is almost taste less except for a slight buttery flavor in coffee . I order this all the time and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Villella

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I fix it when I need that extra special flavor coffees. It's like a treat for me, add a little whipped whipping cream and it's my desert for Keto.
customer_reviews.author: sgt

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST Keto product I’ve tried in my coffee! It’s once and done. Nothing else needed but one scoop of the Salted Caramel MCT oil powder. I’m on my third canister!
customer_reviews.author: Msddsk

customer_reviews.title: Good for KetoDiet
customer_reviews.text: A little too sweet but keeps me in Ketosis. Mixes well with a whisk. Wish they had more flavors on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: linda  mazakis

customer_reviews.title: Sweetener made product bitter
customer_reviews.text: The sweetener was too much. It made the product bitter. It was also greasy because of the butter or oil. But the price was not bad
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Echakara

customer_reviews.title: NowKeto has become part of my morning routine!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every morning as a substitute for creamer. The taste is fantastic (I bought salted caramel) and I feel a great boast to my morning. Definitely recommend for anyone looking to jumpstart their morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my throat feel funny when I first start to drink but it stops afterwards a few sips. It curbs my appetite. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: DGB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday seems to help keep my energy levels up, mixed well with my braun.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to keto coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this MCT oil powder in my coffee for several weeks now. It tastes amazing and has been a great addition to my morning coffee. Perfect support for anyone on the ketogenic diet.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Peters

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, easy to use a little on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and dissolved easy, the price however is a bit sour.,
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This actually does not have any taste, so it is does not change the flavor of anything. Using it in coffee and it does create an "oil" slick type look on the top of my coffee, you must continually stir as the product does not seem to mix well or stay mixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kase

product_meta.title: NOW KETO® Keto MCT Oil Powder from Coconuts | Low Carb High Fat | Medium Chain Triglyceride | Ketogenic Diet Supplement | Activates Ketosis & Boosts Ketones for Keto Diet. Keto Coffee Creamer.
feature_bullets: BOOST KETOSIS - NOW KETO® Pure MCT OIL Powder with C8 from Coconut provides an amazing way to help you with ketosis. Our Pure MCT™ formula was created to provide high-quality MCT OIL Powder on the market. MCTs may help you to get back into ketosis and support weight loss goals. MCTs may help improve overall mental performance, athletic endurance, overall increased energy levels*

MCTS FOR THE KETOGENIC DIET - NOW KETO® is made with high-quality ingredients and contains absolutely low carbs and no sugars. NOW KETO focuses on providing clean keto coffee creamers to help boost your overall performance. Pure MCTs is GMO-Free, Vegan, Gluten Free, Paleo-Friendly, Keto-Friendly, and produced from a Certified GMP facility in the USA.

INCREASE KETONES & KETOSIS - When your on the ketogenic diet for weight loss program you need a quick and easy way to increase ketones. Our Pure MCT OIL POWDER formula mixes easily with your favorite products including bulletproof butter coffee, water, shakes, and coconut milk. Its one of the best tasting all natural MCT ketone supplements with zero sugars and colors.

WEIGHT LOSS GOALS; Pure MCTs contains a unique blend of C8, C10, and C12 for optimal performance. NOW KETO MCT OIL POWDER contains our exclusive Pure MCT™ formula which is one of the best tasting products on the market and processed in the USA. Works great as a bulletproof coffee additive.

NOW KETO was a dream to change the world by helping others. Our unique Keto model helps others fight malnutrition by providing vitamins. NOW KETO donates vitamins to help mothers and children with malnutrition in undeserved countries.
